code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import styles from"./styles.module.css";import KnightGet from"./image/KnightFight.gif";import EnemyTake from"./image/OgreTakeDamage.gif";import KnightTake from"./image/KnightTakeDamage.gif";import EnemeyGet from"./image/OgreSetDamage.gif";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PlayerPunch(){const[heroAnimation,setHeroAnimation]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{setHeroAnimation(true);setTimeout(()=>{setHeroAnimation(false);},1000000);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`hero ${heroAnimation?'animate':''}`,style:{backgroundPosition:'0% 100%',transition:'background-position 1s ease-in-out'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:KnightGet,alt:"Knight"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:EnemyTake})]});}function EnemyPunch(){const[enemyAnimation,setEnemyAnimation]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{setEnemyAnimation(true);setTimeout(()=>{setEnemyAnimation(false);},1000);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`enemy ${enemyAnimation?'animate':''}`,style:{backgroundPosition:'0% 100%',transition:'background-position 1s ease-in-out'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:KnightTake,alt:"Knight"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:EnemeyGet})]});}export{EnemyPunch,PlayerPunch};
